resources.string: If you\'ve done it, you drink.
Guess if the card is higher or lower.
Different rounds with phrases and random events. Add players to the group menu to enable special random events!
Surprise events! Don\'t forget to add players.
Players will be selected randomly for challenges.
Since %1$s drank the most, they must choose a punishment for %2$s!
It\'s a tie! Everyone drinks a friendship shot.
Follow the instructions on each card and tap next.
Random events will appear. Add players to activate them!
Remember to drink water and play responsibly.
Complete the challenge or drink 2 extra sips.
Fast! If you fail, drink 2 sips.
Do you dare? If not, drink 2 sips.
If MAN wins, women drink. If WOMAN wins, men drink.
Say it fast. Fail: 2 shots. Success: distribute 3.
Stare at each other. First to blink or laugh: DRINKS.
Whoever breaks your rule, drinks. (Lasts until a new Judge appears).
First one to raise their hand gets something special...
If you drop it or chicken out: SHOT.
Take a photo and post it. The photographer chooses who drinks.
Show off! If you don\'t dance, drink 2 sips.
On the count of 3, point at someone. Most pointed at DRINKS.
Count to 3 and look at someone. If eyes lock: BOTH DRINK!
Others guess. If nobody guesses in 30s, YOU DRINK.
must take 1 shot without using hands
must sing a song out loud
Create a rule. Ex: Nobody can say \'YES\' or \'NO\'.
Pass an ice cube mouth-to-mouth around the circle.
Everyone who wants a GIFT raise your hand NOW!
SALVATION! Joker card to skip a dare.
BOTTOMS UP! Finish your glass now.
Last one to stand up: 2 SHOTS
Last one to touch the floor: DRINKS
Phone in hand right now: DRINK
If your name has a U: DRINK
If you smoke: TAKE A LONG SIP
If you go to the gym: DRINK. If not: ALSO DRINK
Vote for the one who laughs the most: DRINKS
Show the last photo in your gallery (No explanations)
Hug Round: Hug the person to your left
Girls asking for sushi on IG Notes: CHUG
The oldest: PICKS TWO FOR A CROSS SHOT
Whoever has the most siblings: DRINKS
Drink if you are sitting down
Last one standing: CHOOSES WHO DRINKS
The youngest chooses 2 for cross shot
Tallest and shortest person: CROSS SHOT
Dark hair: 1 sip. Dyed hair: 2 sips
Drink: Leo, Capricorn, Cancer, and Gemini
Drink: Aquarius, Taurus, Aries, and Libra
Sagittarius: SHOT for talking too much
Got back with an ex: DRINK
Snuck out of the house: DRINK
If you\'d kiss someone here: DRINK
Prefer being married over single: SHOT
Kissed someone out of pity: SHOT
Have a fake Instagram for stalking: SHOT
Had an erotic dream about someone here: DRINK
Point to the quietest: TAKES A SHOT
Whoever proposed playing chooses 3 to drink
First to arrive chooses 2 to peck
Serious faces: First to laugh DRINKS
Each woman chooses 1 person to drink
Last to touch their nose: DRINKS
Swap an item of clothing with person to right or DRINK
Traveled to another continent: SAFE. Others drink.
Say 3 truths and 1 lie about yourself
CONFESSION: What age was your first time?
CONFESSION: Weirdest place you\'ve done it?
CONFESSION: First thing you look at in someone?
SWAP PLACES! Everyone swap seats with anyone

Try to touch your nose with your tongue.

Shoulder massage 1 min to person on right
Last to touch something GREEN loses

Imitate someone in the group until guessed.

Hold ice in your mouth until melted.

Let someone post an IG story on your account.
Act as a waiter for 10 minutes.
Tell a joke. Nobody laughs? Drink double.
Speak in third person until next turn.
Walk on all fours until next turn.

Show the last 3 photos in your gallery or take 3 sips.
Do a sexy dance for the person across from you.
Call a restaurant and order a "Kampai Burger" with confidence.
Smell the foot of the person to your right (with sock... or not).
Sit on the lap of the person to your left until your next turn.

Take a shot from someone\'s navel (Body Shot).

Sing everything you say for 2 rounds.
Do 50 crunches or finish your drink.

Put your socks on your hands until the next turn.

Take a sip without using your hands (someone feeds you).
Imitate a loud orgasm for 10 seconds.
Read out loud the last WhatsApp message you sent.
Wear your underwear over your pants for 2 rounds.
Eat a spoonful of cinnamon, hot sauce, or pure lemon.
Let someone write something on your forehead.
Dance the Macarena without music and with a serious face.
Give a foot massage to the person on your right.
Drink water from a pet\'s bowl (or a bowl on the floor).
Send a moaning voice note to a contact chosen by the group.
Spin around quickly 10 times and try to walk in a straight line.
Put an ice cube in your underwear until it melts.
Let the group DM a celebrity from your account.
Act like a dog and ask everyone for pets.
Drink every time someone says your name during this round.
Swap your shirt/t-shirt with the person to your left.
Make a dramatic declaration of love to a lamp or object.
Let someone wax/tape a small area of your leg.
Lick the earlobe of the person to your right.
Sing the chorus of your favorite song at the top of your lungs.
Do a plank for 1 minute. If you drop, drink double.
Let someone check the notes on your phone.
Drink a full glass of water without breathing.
Walk like a runway model across the room.
Get on your knees and propose to the person chosen by the group.
Put your hand in the toilet (and wash it afterwards, please).
Twerk against the wall for 20 seconds.
Call a wrong number and try to sell them a vacuum cleaner.
You cannot show your teeth when laughing until your next turn.
Kiss the hand of everyone present.
Let someone crack an egg on your head (or take 2 shots).
Pretend to be an influencer and promote an imaginary product.
Take a sip from every player\'s drink.
Put ice on your nipples for 30 seconds.
Draw a mustache on your face with something non-toxic.
Do 20 squats with someone on your back.
Show your ID or passport photo to everyone.
Let someone post an "I\'m pregnant/expecting" status on your social media.
Do the worm on the floor.
Let your hands be tied for 10 minutes.
Try to lick your elbow while everyone films you.
Speak with an exaggerated posh/valley girl accent.
Take off your socks with another person\'s teeth.
Make a tower of cards/objects. If it falls, you drink.
Kiss your own reflection in the mirror passionately.
Send a barking voice note to the last WhatsApp group you used.
Take a shot of soy sauce or vinegar.
Let someone tickle you until you say "STOP" (and drink for giving up).
Imitate how you have intimacy (with sounds).
Slow dance with a broom or mop.
Put your shoes on your hands and clap.
Let someone draw something on your back and guess what it is. If you fail, drink.
Close your eyes and let someone feed you something surprise.
Show the contents of your wallet/purse.
Make up a poem about alcohol and recite it.
Try to juggle 3 objects. For every drop, a sip.
Make an ugly face and hold it until the next turn.
Drink with your non-dominant hand for the rest of the game.
Call your crush and hang up immediately.
Play dead on the floor until someone revives you (with a kiss or a drink).
Guess someone\'s underwear color. If you fail, remove an item of clothing.
Let the group choose your new wallpaper.
Speak without opening your mouth for 2 rounds.
Kiss someone\'s bald spot or forehead.
Make a ridiculous TikTok video and save it to drafts.
Eat a slice of lemon without making a face.
Sit on the floor and don\'t use furniture for 3 rounds.
Imitate another player. If they don\'t guess, you drink.
Let yourself be blindfolded and guess who is touching your face.
Moan the name of the person to your left.
Make an embarrassing toast to yourself.
Chew water and gargle a song.
Take a photo sticking your tongue out and post it.
Touch someone\'s nose with your tongue.
Promote the app on your social network of choice.
Bottoms up! Finish your drink right now.
Everyone drinks until the player stops.
Say a word, rhyme until fail.
Say a category, name items until fail.
1st King: Choose WHAT goes in the cup.\nMix the central drink.
2nd King: Choose WHERE to drink.\nEx: Standing on table, under table...
3rd King: Choose HOW to drink.\nEx: Crouching, no hands...
4th King: BAD LUCK!\nYou must drink the entire central cup following previous rules.
Everyone drinks until the card drawer stops.
Thumb on table. Last one drinks.
Pick a mate. When you drink, they drink.
Say a word. Everyone rhymes. Fail/Repeat = Drink.
Ex: Car brands. Blank out = Drink.
Invent a rule (ex: drink with left hand). Break it = Drink.
1st King: Choose WHAT goes in the cup.
4th King: Drink the cup fulfilling all rules.
How do you want to play?
No pressure. Think calm, answer when ready.
Tick-Tock! Answer fast or the bomb explodes.
Say elements of the category in order

resources.string:
‚Ä¢ Everyone gets a secret word
‚Ä¢ Except the impostor who knows nothing
‚Ä¢ Give clues without revealing the word
‚Ä¢ Impostor must fake knowing it
‚Ä¢ Vote on who the impostor is
You don\'t know the word\nFake it!

‚Ä¢ Give clues in turns
‚Ä¢ Don't say the word directly
‚Ä¢ Impostor must fake it
‚Ä¢ Watch for suspicious behavior

‚Ä¢ Act without speaking
‚Ä¢ Your team must guess
‚Ä¢ Every word counts
‚Ä¢ Don't use hands illegally!

string-array.name: charades_hard_list
string-array.item: Flirt with bartender for free drinks
Act sober in front of parents

resources.string: Kampai is for entertainment purposes only.
‚Ä¢ You must be 18+ (or legal age) to use this app
‚Ä¢ Kampai does not promote alcohol abuse.
Play responsibly and look after your friends. If you have alcohol issues, seek professional help. By continuing, you confirm you are of legal age and accept full responsibility for using this app.
I Accept & I am of legal age

...cry in the middle of the party.
...appear on the news for something stupid.
...spend their entire paycheck in one night.
...fall in love with an exotic dancer.
...be the first to die in a zombie apocalypse.
...laugh at a very inappropriate moment (like a funeral).
...have a restraining order for being too intense.
...donate all their money to a pyramid scheme.
...get married in Las Vegas on a crazy night.
...fake their own disappearance to escape debt.
...have an affair with their boss for a promotion.
...tattoo their partner\'s name after knowing them for a month.
...end up living with their parents at 40.
...kiss the most people at this party.
...wake up without clothes in a park.
...end up supporting a much younger partner.
...win the lottery and lose it all in a week.
...have a deep conversation with a dog.
...get fined for doing their business in the street.
...spend the night with a stranger today.
...use a fake identity on social media.
...lie on their resume and get the job.
...set the kitchen on fire trying to boil water.
...end up in a hospital because of a dumb bet.
...experiment with someone of their same gender today.
...block someone right after spending the night together.
...be unfaithful and blame the other person.
...buy an island if they were rich.
...survive the longest alone on a desert island.
...get their phone stolen for being absent-minded.
...end up arguing with an inanimate object.
...fall in love with someone just for how they treat them in bed.
...say the wrong name in an intimate moment.
...start cleaning the house in the middle of the party.
...have something contagious and not know it.
...be the first to die in a horror movie.
...create a fake account to criticize someone.
...end up bathing with clothes on in the pool.
...kiss the person to their right if they dare.
...end up in a convent or monastery.
...spend all their money buying drinks today.
...flirt with a police officer to avoid a fine.
...want to be the center of attention at someone else\'s wedding.
...be a bad example for their children.
...end up on a controversial reality show.
...be with two people on the same day.
...sell pictures of their feet on the internet.
...laugh at their own joke before telling it.
...end up sleeping on the street for losing their keys.
...get into a fight to defend a friend.
...end up hooking up with someone from this group.
...be the first to leave the WhatsApp group.
...have the worst hangover in history tomorrow.
...send a text to the wrong person.
...wear the same underwear two days in a row.
...eat the last piece of pizza without asking.
...think they are an influencer with 200 followers.
...fall in love with an anime character.
...try to do a backflip and break something.
...write a book about their romantic adventures.
...move into a van and travel the world.
...suggest doing it in a forbidden place.
...have a piercing in a hidden place.
...have been with someone just out of spite.
...have done it in a club bathroom.
...end up kissing someone before the game ends.
...propose playing Spin the Bottle after this.
...be vegan but eat meat when drinking.
...make a Tinder profile with fake photos.
...be the first to fall asleep at a sleepover.
...have more than 5 cats in the future.
...tattoo a phrase in Chinese without knowing what it says.
...shave their head in an existential crisis.
...go on a spiritual retreat and not return.
...go into the sea with clothes on.
...get sunburned and look like a shrimp.
...go out with the tags still on their clothes.
...put their shoes on the wrong feet.
...sneeze and fart at the same time.
...dress up as a ghost to scare people.
...be the killer in a mystery movie.
...borrow money and not pay it back.
...not be able to live without their phone.
...end up kissing someone at the party.

resources.string: Add players to start the party
